name: John Clark
coverLetter: I have quite a few years experience in trimming and growing. I am originally from California and grew my share there prior to legalization and had a pretty good crop out here last year. I can trim close to 2 lbs of outdoor a day maybe more depending on the environment. I do not need a place to live. I will be coming home at night but do need meals provided during shifts. I would prefer to be paid by the pound rather than hourly but all is negotiable.
